title: Are Locusts permissible to eat? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: as the locust the locust is permissible to eat abdullah we joined the prophet alice islam on six or seven military expeditions and we ate locusts with him so these swarms of locusts in the millions that occupy and destroy the crops and and the farms and the green areas these locusts are totally permissible to be consumed of course they are not slaughtered because they're not animals and to many people they enjoy eating it
